ID: C1E51GC_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-10 23:30
Subject: Major Incident Resolved: SIOCS outage for Level Shoes Warehouse and Dubai Mall store
--------------------------------------------------
 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

Please be informed that the earlier reported Major Incident affecting SIOCS access in both the Level Shoes Warehouse and in the Dubai Mall store has now been resolved, and SIOCS access has been restored.

 

Issue Summary:

*	SIOCS was not working in both Level Shoes Warehouse and Dubai Mall store.

 

Business Impact:

*	Store replenishment and stock transfers were impacted at both the Warehouse and the Dubai Mall store.

 

Resolution & Recovery:

*	SIOCS accessible at Level Shoes Dubai Mall store.
*	SIOCS accessible at Level Shoes Warehouse.
*	Test transactions carried out successfully at both locations by on-site colleagues.

 

Start Date and Time: Wed, 10 Sep 8.30PM

End Date and Time : Wed, 10 Sep 10:40PM

 

We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.
